member.name: IMFImageSharingEngine.GetDevice
member.summary: Gets information about the image sharing device.
member.param: A pointer to a structure. The method fills in this structure with the device information.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFImageSharingEngine.SetSource
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFImageSharingEngine.Shutdown
member.summary: Shuts down the image sharing engine.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
